116469.text: PersistentVolumes have a new LastPhaseTransitionTime field which holds a timestamp of when the volume last transitioned its phase.
116469.markdown: PersistentVolumes have a new LastPhaseTransitionTime field which holds a timestamp of when the volume last transitioned its phase. ([#116469](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/116469), [@RomanBednar](https://github.com/RomanBednar)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps, Auth, Node, Release, Storage and Testing]
116469.author: RomanBednar

117015.text: Add implementation for PodRecreationPolicy to wait for creation of pods once the existing ones are fully terminated.
117015.markdown: Add implementation for PodRecreationPolicy to wait for creation of pods once the existing ones are fully terminated. ([#117015](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/117015), [@kannon92](https://github.com/kannon92)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps and Testing]
117015.author: kannon92

118644.markdown: Promoted API groups `ValidatingAdmissionPolicy` and `ValidatingAdmissionPolicyBinding` to `v1beta1`. ([#118644](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/118644), [@alexzielenski](https://github.com/alexzielenski)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps and Testing]
118644.author: alexzielenski

118828.text:
Changed how KMS v2 encryption at rest can generate data encryption keys.
When you enable the `KMSv2KDF` feature gate (off by default), KMS v2 uses a key derivation function to generate single use data encryption keys from a secret seed combined with some random data.  This eliminates the need for a counter based nonce while avoiding nonce collision concerns associated with AES-GCM's 12 byte nonce.
118828.markdown:
Changed how KMS v2 encryption at rest can generate data encryption keys.
  When you enable the `KMSv2KDF` feature gate (off by default), KMS v2 uses a key derivation function to generate single use data encryption keys from a secret seed combined with some random data.  This eliminates the need for a counter based nonce while avoiding nonce collision concerns associated with AES-GCM's 12 byte nonce. ([#118828](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/118828), [@enj](https://github.com/enj)) [SIG API Machinery, Auth and Testing]
118828.author: enj

119409.text: Promoted the feature gate `ValidtaingAdmissionPolicy` to beta and it is turned off by default.
119409.markdown: Promoted the feature gate `ValidtaingAdmissionPolicy` to beta and it is turned off by default. ([#119409](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/119409), [@alexzielenski](https://github.com/alexzielenski)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps, Auth, Instrumentation, Node, Release, Storage and Testing]
119409.author: alexzielenski
